page.title: 12LEISURE 2
page.content: {FOOTBALLING { }"Footballing is my second favour ite sport. I do not play for a team; I just play in the playground at schoo l.I tried to get into the school team but could'nt.I sometimes play football at home,but I'm normally playing other things.I support Arsenal(a team of over-paid,undertalented playboys,livin g on past glories & noted for dull,un imaginative play in the 1980s)& watch their matches on television"M.Whale,10 {ENTERTAINMENT IN BRACKNELL "Entertainment in Bracknell is average It is a sporty area but has only 1 cin ema with 70-80 seats at South Hill Par k Arts Centre.It has an Art Gallery & many courses & the new Wilde Theatre. There are 3 libraries but no museum. Discos cater for the young(& deaf) & there are lots of restaurants,wine bar s,snack bars&pubs".Class 2J E.Park Sch
